pr_title: Remove unwanted jvmti error code for Java 8

timeline.bodyText: This line can be removed.  Nestmates is an 11 feature so we don't need the specific ifdef for it anymore
timeline.author: DanHeidinga
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -341,7 +341,10 @@ typedef enum jvmtiError {
 	JVMTI_ERROR_NAMES_DONT_MATCH = 69,
 	JVMTI_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_REDEFINITION_CLASS_MODIFIERS_CHANGED = 70,
 	JVMTI_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_REDEFINITION_METHOD_MODIFIERS_CHANGED = 71,
-	JVMTI_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_REDEFINITION_CLASS_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED = 72,
+dnl m4 can't understand (defined(J9VM_OPT_VALHALLA_NESTMATES))

replies.bodyText: Perhaps it's time to remove all appearances of J9VM_OPT_VALHALLA_NESTMATES (in a separate PR)?
replies.author: keithc-ca

replies.bodyText: Agreed.  They should all become Java 11 version checks
replies.author: DanHeidinga

replies.bodyText: @DanHeidinga Do you also agree that change should be in a separate pull request or would you prefer I add those changes here?
replies.author: keithc-ca

replies.bodyText: My assumption, and sorry if it wasn't clear, is that we'd delete the lines in this PR and the larger cleanup of J9VM_OPT_VALHALLA_NESTMATES can be deferred to another issue
replies.author: DanHeidinga

timeline.message:
Remove unwanted jvmti error code for Java 8

JVMTI_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_REDEFINITION_CLASS_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED
should only be declared for Java11+

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>

Remove unwanted jvmti error code for Java 8

JVMTI_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED_REDEFINITION_CLASS_ATTRIBUTE_CHANGED
should only be declared for Java11+

Signed-off-by: Keith W. Campbell <keithc@ca.ibm.com>
